sentences.english: The four victims were found malnourished and suffering from bedsores.
sentences.chinese: 四名受害者被发现时，营养不良且长满褥疮。

sentences.english: Objective: To repair the bedsores on the ischial tuberosities.
sentences.chinese: 目的修复坐骨结节褥疮。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the use value of He - Ne Laser irradiation for bedsore.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨氦氖激光局部照射治疗褥疮的疗效。

sentences.english: Objective To verify the efficacy of ultraviolet therapy in treating bedsore.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨运用冷光紫外线治疗感染性褥疮的临床疗效。

sentences.english: Objective To provide a kind of valid treatment for the bedsore.
sentences.chinese: 目的提供一种有效治疗褥疮的医院制剂。

sentences.english: Position client comfortably with area of decubitus ulcer and surrounding skin easily accessible.
sentences.chinese: 病人体位舒适，褥疮性溃疡部位及周围皮肤易于处理。

sentences.english: Objective To study the effect of compound plantain ointment in curing bedsore.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究复方车前草软膏对于褥疮的治疗作用。

sentences.english: Families with long-term bedridden individuals most fear the onset of bedsores in the patient.
sentences.chinese: 家有长期卧床的瘫痪老人，最怕的就是发生褥疮。

sentences.english: Objective To observe the curative effect of draco-treatment for the aged patients with bedsores.
sentences.chinese: 目的观察血竭粉对治疗高龄褥疮患者的疗效。

sentences.english: Objective To study the treatment of enteral nutrition for the patients lie in bed longer with bedsore.
sentences.chinese: 目的了解肠内营养对长期卧床患者褥疮的治疗作用。

sentences.english: Objective To study the effects of M EBO in treating ulcerative bedsore.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨湿润烧伤膏治疗溃疡性褥疮的疗效。

sentences.english: The bedsore is also one of paraplegia common complications.
sentences.chinese: 褥疮也是截瘫常见的并发症之一。

sentences.english: Objective To assess the effects of curing bedsores with the compound of collagen gel.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨胶原凝胶复合物对各种类型褥疮的治疗效果。

sentences.english: During the talk, I found that he had gotten bedsores.
sentences.chinese: 在谈话间，我发现他得了褥疮。

sentences.english: ObjectiveTo study the efficacy of dragon's blood powder in the treatment of bed-sore at ulceration.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨血竭粉治疗溃疡期褥疮的疗效。

sentences.english: Objective To study the effect of compound plantain ointment in curing bedsore.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究复方车前草软膏对褥疮的治疗作用。

definition: paralysis of one side of the body/hemiplegia
